Class Directory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.util.Directory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Baseline

    public class Directory
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to resolve the absolute path of an artifact

        Create a new Directoy for the specified nodes of the specified root object
        Parameters:
        rootId - is the ID of the root object
        dirs - is a Collection of the directory nodes below root
        comparator - is a Comparator to determine the node order

        Parameters:
